title: Welcome to react using react-i18next OLL DESIGN

description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.

gallery_groups.badge_hover: グラフィックデザイン

desc.address: ▼Store Production (Domestic & International)|Store design and supervision|Store planning and production|Property introduction, investigation, and sales forecasting|Store renovations and new business development|Consulting for overseas store openings|Production and sales of imported overseas goods (furniture, fixtures, kitchen equipment, etc.)||▼Graphic Design|Logo and web design|Print design (flyers, business cards, menus, etc.) to printing||▼Original Goods Planning, Creation, and Sales|Amusement prizes|Apparel, stationery, miscellaneous goods
Shanghai Onishi Group Architectural Design Consulting Co., Ltd.|No. 2 Warehouse, 1098 Jiangyang South Road, Baoshan District, Shanghai

desc.business: 出店プロデュース（国内・海外対応）

sub_business.name: 店舗企画・店舗設計・設計監理
物件紹介・売上げ予測
店舗改装・新業態開発
国内・海外出店コンサルティング
海外輸入品制作・販売（家具・什器・厨房等

desc.business: グラフィックデザイン

sub_business.name: 紙面デザイン（チラシ・名刺・メニュー等）～印刷
ウェブデザイン・ホームページ作成

desc.business: イベント企画・イベントプロデュース

sub_business.name: 音響設備レンタル・音響スタッフ派遣
オリジナルグッズ作成・販売（Tシャツ・ユニフォ−ム等）

business.header: We build stores that sell.|||It's our mission.
business.desc: OLLDESIGN is a store design company.|||Utilizing chain store theories studied in the United States, we aim to create successful stores across various business types. Once a client secures a property, we develop the blueprints and design, supporting the process up to the store's opening.||||||We also offer marketing consulting, handling operations when customers visit the store. For example, we discuss specifics like the ideal product delivery speed and layout when serving multiple customers. Our detailed consulting approach means projects typically take six months to a year to complete.||||||Rather than focusing solely on aesthetic design, our priority is creating stores that consistently generate sales. We strive to build efficient stores that delight customers

business.header: Design based on numerical evidence from IE (industrial engineering)
business.desc: A scientific method that quantifies every problem and event, logically improving and reforming them.||||||Believing that competitors are not limited to domestic ones, we conduct store comparisons worldwide. Through this process, we have developed unique expertise, information, and knowledge that make us strong in chain stores.

business.header: Strategic design tailored to store objectives and conditions
business.desc: We propose a comprehensive review and standardization of your store opening process to maximize cost savings and profitability. Our approach goes beyond just reducing opening costs. We focus on shortening construction timelines (boosting sales by opening sooner), optimizing workflow plans (reducing labor costs), and creating highly appealing and strategically located store designs (increasing customer traffic).
select_2: Extensive expertise in chain store design.
Store openings in Japan and overseas, with consulting in Asia.

homepage.QDesc: It is often thought to be a business that only accompanies design work, and we frequently receive this question from customers. But the answer is, of course, 'Yes, we'd be delighted.' This is the background to why we launched this dedicated page for our graphic business.

homepage.ideaTitle: What our graphic business can do

childrenDetail.title: Branding
childrenDetail.header: Building the image of your company's products and services
childrenDetail.desc: ■ Logo design ■ Package design ■ Web design ■ Illustration creation|||■ Brochures ■ Company profiles ■ Posters ■ Business cards ■ Medical appointment cards ■ Loyalty cards, etc.|||■ Uniforms ■ Custom merchandise creation

childrenDetail.title: Sign design
childrenDetail.header: Effective sign design that maximizes the image of your store
childrenDetail.desc: ■ Facade signs ■ Wall signs ■ Projecting signs (blade signs) ■ Freestanding signs (pole signs) ■ Stand signs|||■ Window signs ■ Neon signs ■ LED signs ■ Panel signs ■ Flag signs|||■ Rooftop signs ■ A-frame signs ■ Box signs (channel letters) ■ Banners and streamers

childrenDetail.title: Website creation
childrenDetail.header: Proposing web design services using the latest technology
childrenDetail.desc: Together with our partner companies, we offer innovative web design services utilizing the latest technology. Responsive design, interactive elements, and AI-driven personalization maximize user experience. We provide SEO optimization, fast loading, and intuitive UI design for an excellent visitor experience. Additionally, we implement the latest security technologies to ensure safe site operations. Strengthen your digital presence and enhance your brand power.

childrenDetail.title: Advertising and promotional design
childrenDetail.header: Effectively convey your message with visually appealing designs.
childrenDetail.desc: Our advertising and promotional designs excel at catering to various advertising needs. With collaborations with many partner companies, we offer one-stop solutions. We have extensive knowledge and experience in printing and merchandise production, delivering high-quality results. We consistently support advertising and promotional strategies tailored to customer needs, from design to printing.

childrenDetail.title: Photography and video production
childrenDetail.header: Enhancing your brand with high-quality visuals and technology
childrenDetail.desc: Our photography and video production services deliver high-quality visuals that highlight your brand's appeal. Utilizing the latest filming techniques, we focus on storytelling to create compelling content. From promotional videos to product showcases, we cater to various needs and provide end-to-end support from editing to final production.

homepage.header: Design skills utilizing 'success stories' referred to as achievements
homepage.desc: We possess 'comprehensive design skills' that integrate design work and graphic design.|||In other words, our one-stop service, combining spatial design, store design, brand strategy, and graphic design, is your greatest strength.
